Package jx.compiler.execenv

Class BCMethodWithCode

java.lang.Object
jx.compiler.execenv.BCMethod
jx.compiler.execenv.BCMethodWithCode
public class BCMethodWithCode extends BCMethod
This class represents a Java method with its associated bytecode. It's interface contains various methods to transform and evaluate the method. Ususally you will use this class to translate a method into native code.
